flavorText: Keldons were accustomed to rugged terrain, but they never expected it to be aggressive.

foreignData.name: Lebendige Landschaft
foreignData.text: Das verzauberte Land ist eine 5/6 grüne Baumhirten- Kreatur, die auch noch ein Land ist.

name: Living Terrain
originalText: Enchanted land is a 5/6 green Treefolk creature that's still a land.

rulings.text: This can be placed on any land, not just Forests.
It does give the land a color and creature type, which is unlike most other ways to animate a land.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a 5/6 green Treefolk creature that's still a land.
